sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { Input, Flex, Box, PseudoBox, SimpleGrid } from '@chakra-ui/core';
import { createStyles, makeStyles, Theme } from '@material-ui/core/styles';

const useStyles = makeStyles((theme: Theme) =>
  createStyles({
    pad: {
      width: '300px',
      alignItems: 'center',
      justifyContent: 'center',
      height: '600px',
    },
    number: {
      cursor: 'pointer',
      backgroundColor: 'rgb(100,100,100)',
      padding: '15px 23px',
      borderRadius: '50%',
      color: 'white',
      fontSize: '26px',
    },
    numberTwoZeros: {
      cursor: 'pointer',

      backgroundColor: 'rgb(100,100,100)',
      padding: '15px',
      borderRadius: '50%',
      color: 'white',
      fontSize: '26px',
    },
  })
);
export default function NumberPad() {
  const classes = useStyles();

  return (
    <Flex className={classes.pad}>
      <SimpleGrid columns={3} spacing={2}>
        <Flex width="100px" align="center" justify="center" height="100px">
          <Box className={classes.number}>1</Box>
        </Flex>
        <Flex width="100px" align="center" justify="center" height="100px">
          <Box className={classes.number}>2</Box>
        </Flex>
        <Flex width="100px" align="center" justify="center" height="100px">
          <Box className={classes.number}>3</Box>
        </Flex>
        <Flex width="100px" align="center" justify="center" height="100px">
          <Box className={classes.number}>4</Box>
        </Flex>
        <Flex width="100px" align="center" justify="center" height="100px">
          <Box className={classes.number}>5</Box>
        </Flex>
        <Flex width="100px" align="center" justify="center" height="100px">
          <Box className={classes.number}>6</Box>
        </Flex>
        <Flex width="100px" align="center" justify="center" height="100px">
          <Box className={classes.number}>7</Box>
        </Flex>
        <Flex width="100px" align="center" justify="center" height="100px">
          <Box className={classes.number}>8</Box>
        </Flex>
        <Flex width="100px" align="center" justify="center" height="100px">
          <Box className={classes.number}>9</Box>
        </Flex>
        <Flex width="100px" align="center" justify="center" height="100px">
          <Box className={classes.number}>0</Box>
        </Flex>
        <Flex width="100px" align="center" justify="center" height="100px">
          <Box className={classes.numberTwoZeros}>00</Box>
        </Flex>
      </SimpleGrid>
    </Flex>
  );
}
